flawed_nl_solution:
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=20>>20 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 20 = <<13+20=30>>30 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 30 = <<3*30=90>>90 fish
The fisherman caught 90 - 13 = <<90-13=77>>77 more fish than the pelican.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
